annot-description: Annotation tool for Semantic MediaWiki texts
ohi-description: Semantically annotate texts and query for those annotations following the Objective Hermeneutic Methodology.
group-annotadmin.css: /* CSS placed here will affect annot administrators only */
group-annotadmin.js: /* JS placed here will affect annot administrators only */
group-annotsubmit.css: /* CSS placed here will affect annot participants only */
group-annotsubmit.js: /* JS placed here will affect annot participants only */
annot-err-id-xor-name: You need to provide either the ID or the name of the annot to submit
annot-err-annot-name-unknown: There is no annot with the name "$1"
annot-err-duplicate-name: There already is a annot with the name "$1"
annot-err-ids-xor-names: You need to provide either the IDs or the names of the annots to query
annots-special-namedoc: Enter an unique identifier (ID) for the new annot. Can not be changed later. For example: editor-motivation.
annots-special-confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this annot?
annot-special-label-usertype: Users that should get the annot
annot-special-label-minpages: Minimum amount of pages the user needs to visit before getting the annot
annots-takeannot-nosuchannot: The requested annot does not exist.
annots-takeannot-warn-notenabled: This annot has not been enabled yet, and therefore is not visible to users.
annots-takeannot-annotnotenabled: The requested annot has not been enabled yet.
annots-annotstats-nosuchannot: The requested annot does not exist. You can view a [[Special:Annots|list of available annots]].
annots-special-unknown-name: There is no annot with the requested ID.
annot-special-label-ratio: Percentage of people to show the annot to
annot-special-remove-confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this question?
annot-special-label-header: Text to display above the annot
annot-special-label-footer: Text to display below the annot
annot-special-label-thanks: Thanks message to display after submission of the annot
